units.title: Additional SenML Units
units.hnote: This file provides an additional set of senml units in addition to the ones listed in the SenML Registry at https://www.iana.org/assignments/senml/senml.xml.

record.note: IPSO WG agreed to adopt Ws as per meeting minutes Jan 16, 2020
IPSO WG agreed to adopt VAh as per meeting minutes Oct 10, 2020
IPSO WG agreed to adopt NTU as per meeting minutes Oct 10, 2020
IPSO WG agreed to adopt mg/l as per meeting minutes Oct 10, 2020
IPSO WG agreed to adopt ppt as per meeting minutes Oct 10, 2020
